properties.name: crm.cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed response headers

properties.name: crm.cors.origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of permitted values of request header Origin

properties.name: crm.cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: If true, credentials will be included in CORS requests

properties.name: crm.cors.exposed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of exposed response headers (note different to 'allowed' response headers)

properties.name: crm.bpm.process-gateway
properties.description: The gateway (not fully qualified endpoint) to interact with process instances
